column4: ok, I have just installed ubuntu 10.04 and I have a VGA lead going from my VGA out on my graphics card to my TV. . if I go into Nvidia X Server Settings I can see two displays there but I cant get the desktop to show up .. what am I missing here?
I just wanna get the TV out working
you have to enable the second display
- yea I have done
- ok you are right, its disabled.. you can click on it to enable it but there doesnt seem to be a way of saving the changes
you're right -- that blows
doesn't work
- any ideas how to get it going?
can't you even get an image out of the second display?
that I can do, it's just that the settings can't be made permanent
did you set the second display's configuration to twinview?
- 1 sec I will try again
- yep just done it .. no luck
you did press "apply", right?
- yup
and both displays look fine in the layout view? both have a resolution etc?
if you can't get it to work, you could toss out the proprietary driver, although you'll lose 3D support
- ahh it works now.. I turned the res down
- hmm so how do you o about getting the settings saved?
if there is, I haven't found one
- so what do you do? just set the monitor as enabled everytime you boot?
yup :(
- thankyou for your help tho .. :)
